thread.section_title: Ink Station Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ink Station | inkstation.com.au
thread.title: SALLY A CHACKO
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by SALLY A CHACKO

author: SALLY A CHACKO
title: SALLY A CHACKO
text: Have been using Ink Station for several years now for all our printer toner needs. We have over 20 printers in our organization in different locations and orders are always processed and dispatched promptly and received quickly by our staff. From the hundreds of compatible toners i have ordered over the years, we have only ever had one failure, and when i notified Ink Station, they replaced it immediately and the arrangements they made to pick up the defective one was made easy and hassle free. Excellent customer service. Because i order regularly, i can see how long each toner lasts and can say the product is very consistent and comparable with the original. Highly recommended.
